price: Na bila ya shaka walikwisha kanusha walio kuwa kabla yao; basi kulikuwaje kukasirika kwangu?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
footnotes: Na hakika walikwisha wakanusha Mitume wao hao walio kuwa kabla ya kaumu yako. Basi ghadhabu yangu juu yao ilikuwa hali gani kwa nilivyo waangamiza na kuwashika!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
